Application.title: Application
Application.description: This is the Application__c record Id This is the Application_c record that the Candidate is applying for and is related to the Candidate record Format: 18 digit ID

BadFit.title: BadFit
BadFit.description: What requirements/ Skills missing: where might this candidate possibly be missing or lacking for this specific job spec Format: Long Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: What requirements/ Skills missing:

GoodFit.title: GoodFit
GoodFit.description: What makes applicant a good fit for this specific job spec Format: Long Text The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: What makes applicant a good fit

Job_Spec.title: Job_Spec
Job_Spec.description:
This is the Job Spec the Candidate is applying for, this record is related to the Application record 
The Id is provided by the user:(Job Spec ID:) 
Application record 
Format: 18 digit ID

Overview.title: Overview
Overview.description: This is the Job_Spec that the Applicant applied Format: 18 digit ID Input from the Update Application Prompt

Rating.title: Rating
Rating.description: Application Rating: What would you score the applicant out of ten for this Job Spec Format: Number The input is retrieved from the Update Application Prompt where it will say: Application Rating:

RecordId.title: RecordId
RecordId.description:
This is the Candidate__c record Id
This Id is provided by the User: (RecordId: )
